BODHost UK Windows VPS Hosting packages are secure and flexible for users who wants to use a Windows environment with complete remote desktop access. A Bodhost UK Windows VPS servers has its own independent licensed copy of Windows Server 2003, can be rebooted independently and managed with Remote Desktop access. Each Windows VPS also has its own System Registry, Applications and System Files.
